channel.title: Networking – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: Change Network Card MAC Address in Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: There are a lot of reasons you might want to manually set your MAC address for your network card. To change this setting, we’ll need to edit the /etc/network/interfaces file. You can choose to use a different editor if you’d like. sudo gedit /etc/network/interfaces You should see the line for your network interface, which is usually … Continue reading Change Network Card MAC Address in Ubuntu →

item.title: METHOD FOR ENABLING NET CONNECTION USING AIRTEL GPRS CONNECTION ON LINUX
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: PREREQUISITES -> u shud have a USB cable to connect ur phone to the laptop/system. -> check whether ur phone shows the USB connected symbol on connecting. FIRST STEP: run the command :wvdialconf create , on the terminal , it will show the output as following, [root@localhost ~]# wvdialconf create Scanning your serial ports for … Continue reading METHOD FOR ENABLING NET CONNECTION USING AIRTEL GPRS CONNECTION ON LINUX →
